local_intent: Approach and align to the table, then move to a 0.10 m hover above it while confirming the object is held and position reached.
assumptions: Table pose is known and reachable
White carton remains grasped during approach
coherence_with_global: Implements the approach stage: verifies grasp, aligns to table, executes MoveAbove (0.10 m), and verifies position, matching the corresponding segment of the global sequence.
